title: Can not retrieve in-game chat :(
body: I accidentally moved the in-game chat window so far out of the window that I am no longer able to click on it to drag in back on screen. I tried reinstalling the game but still not there. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Eeeeeee yea unfortunately since the config settings are saved server side (so that you can freely switch pc's and have all your own settings still), a simple reinstall won't be able to reset those options. We'll have to do this a slightly more complicated way, but it's easy enough to do by following these steps exactly.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
